logoutConfirmation.text: Are you sure you want to logout? All software wallets will be removed.

addingExistingAccountWarningWindow.messagePart2: is already in your account list. Please, select another one.

badChainWarningWindow.switchChainMessage: Wrong network selected. Please change your network to {chainName} to continue
